summary: The document is an identification form from INSCOM/CSF, part of the JFK Assassination System, detailing a local agency check on David Reed Fromer in 1966. It references a 1954 editorial where a child named David Fromer inquired about cultural exchange with Russian children. The document, unclassified but released with deletions, belongs to the DOD-Affiliated Personnel Incident Investigations records series and was last reviewed in 1995.
key_findings: The document pertains to a local agency check on David Reed Fromer, conducted in 1966.
It references an editorial from 1954 involving a child named David Fromer, questioning cultural exchange with Russian children.
The document is part of the DOD-Affiliated Personnel Incident Investigations records series.
It was last reviewed in 1995 and is marked as unclassified but released with deletions.
